website_summaries.verdict: Great for frequent travelers. Weathers the test of time and many trips. The material and wheels are known to reliably withstand repeated use.
pros: Come in a variety of colors
Wheels possess a wide turning radius
Bags are lightweight and have top and side carry handles
Each bag has interior pockets for organization
cons: Scuff marks tend to show on the lighter color options of this set

customer_reviews.title: held up well!
customer_reviews.text: bought it for a trip and withstood the air travel! even the wheels did well on the streets of NYC! the handles had no problems! I have no complaints about this set. Be sure if you buy it though, to let it air out for at least a week to get rid of the chemical new material smell. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Wheels Are Crumbling After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this suitcase for 2 months, and the wheels are crumbling!!! I may have really high expectations, but I expect the wheels on my luggage to last MUCH longer than 2 months!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy handles
customer_reviews.text: We fly quite a bit and are always overloading our luggage, often maxing out at 50 lbs per suitcase. These have been loaded and unloaded on flights 10 times and handled by baggage handlers on two cruises in the last 90 days. They are still in great shape. Rolling across carpet is a bit more difficult, but not bad. If they begin to fall apart, I'll update this review, but for now I'd have to say that I would purchase these again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Almost 2 years later...
customer_reviews.text: Almost 2 later since I bought this set and it is lasting me. I handle this luggage carelessly, too. I'm so happy with my purchase. Going to start treating the set better so it will last 2 more years. I travel a lot also. -Ukeeya T.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Ukeeya

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set in purple for our upcoming trip to FL. I wanted the 29” case for myself and a 25” case for my 4 year old daughter. We are big packers. :). This 3 pack also includes a 21” case. The color is fantastic, like a dark eggplant. They seem pretty well constructed for the price. Nice ligning, easy to zip & I zip and have those all direction spinning wheels. So far I’m extremely pleased with them! Time will tell when they travel to and from FL but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Herod

customer_reviews.title: You Won't Be Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of luggage. But please beware that they are heavy themselves...which can cause your luggage to exceed the 50 pound airline limit. The biggest and smallest one made it through the airport and cruise on my trip. And the smallest one (although it is bigger than most carry-on requirements) did pass as my carry on. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nei'Shay

customer_reviews.title: Love it, hate the zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the suitcases, but neglected to check all the zippers when I receive the order. The medium-size bag, I had not used until just recently. Well the other two are perfect, but the medium size bag has a zipper defect that causes this question of the zipper to unravel after it's been zipped. It's no way past the return time. I have no idea if I can exchange it at this point; couldn't find a place on the website that answered that question
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: 3rd set we've ordered - nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick and look great--the 3rd set of these luggage I've purchased. The small bag is the same size as the carry-on so it has everything needed. The middle bag is not as big as the first--but can hold a similar "weight" which is all that matters (50lbs) so the larger size is over-rated (we can pack too much weight in the size and don't want to pay the extra).
customer_reviews.author: Chanimal

customer_reviews.title: Great color,  strong,  durable and handles wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing! I love that it is a nested set, it is strong, durable, handles easily! Took it to Europe on a cruise for2 weeks and the nested set fit perfectly under the bed! Love this product!! Note**Make sure you air out the lugguge on your porch (do not air out inside) the minute it arrives because it has a strong mouth ball smell that took about 2 hours to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Arendsee

customer_reviews.title: Ripped during first flight!!
customer_reviews.text: The medium sized suitcase ripped during the first flight! We did not use the large suitcase. The medium and small suitcases were checked baggage. After we received our luggage (after 1 layover), the front pocket was ripped pretty badly to the point where we lost a couple items (that were never found). I was very disappointed, especially after the good reviews this suitcase received on Amazon. Also, they got very dirty after this one flight. This alone would have made me want to return them. Obviously, we are returning these for a full refund...and should probably ask for additional money for the lost items!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Constant

customer_reviews.title: 3 piece nested American Toutist Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I needed new luggage.. This is a 3-piece nested set and is made by a well-known company American Tourist and is warranted for 10 years. It is good looking and is easy to roll with the four wheels. I have always had just the two wheel type and find these suitcases so much easier to handle..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Ms Duprey

customer_reviews.title: Yeah,I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: The midsized bag is mine.My wife claimed the small one and we share the largest. My bag has survived its first trip,overloaded with 26kg of tools and gear,five aircraft to Africa.Wheels work well,even on asphalt and concrete and 100 meters of dirt. I am not sure how long it will last but I have another big AT bag that has survived this same trip back and forth seven times and wheels are still not broken off and not ripped out anywhere even though I abuse and overload it,last trip was 30kg. Ad far as I am concerned if you want quality and affordable gear this works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jayman

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I am very careful about opening and closing the zipper. I have only used the smallest bag so far but was happy with it. The handle does seem like it is weak, sometimes closing quickly sometimes needing help to go down. Loved the turning radius :). I used the zipper that allows for extra space and that was nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Larger than listed...may not meet your airline requirement
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality - especially for the price. They nested good and looked nice. However, we are going to be flying on United and the limit for the carry-on is 22"x14"x9". The item description on here states it would meet this requirement. However, the carry on overall size including handle and wheels is 23.5". That is why I had to return. The largest size was the exact upper limit of United's requirements and if I could have kept the 2 larger ones, I would have.
customer_reviews.author: william t.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hold up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip, it held up well with the airline throwing it around. The purple set has a nice rich color, although it does still show some dirt, it's not terribly noticeable. the very top compartment zipper broke, but I think I did that while hurriedly trying to get something out of it. The con of this set is that the bags themselves are heavy, so I came very close to the 50 pound limit set by the airlines. Just be aware of what you are packing, save heavy stuff for the smaller bags.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Rollin' like a boss
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases roll with ease. Blaze through the airport at the speed of light without getting hung up by a defunct wheel. Twirl and dance with your luggage to elevator muzak like a pro. Or just pack your clothes and be on your way. Plenty of room in these deep bags. Use caution when packing the largest one to not go over the maximum weight for your airline. The fabric is thick and well made. External pockets are helpful for storing smaller items. The bags roll really easily no matter how heavily they are packed.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Useless Zippers, avoid this model!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were, by-far, the worst suitcases we have ever purchased. From the first time we used them the zippers would bind and then not properly zip. Then, even if you are super careful and get them all zipped up the zippers pop open from the middle while going through the airport... Because we didn't get these returned in time we usually throw a wrap of ductape around them to try and keep them closed...
customer_reviews.author: TanKCR

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and bright
customer_reviews.text: I like the sizes of the three pieces. Will use the small and middle ones the most. I love the color. Hopefully, it will be the only one like it in the turnstile in baggage claim at the airport. That is my intention. There is a small tear in the seam by the zipper of the middle suitcase. It is a big deal in the fact that it is a new suitcase and I hope that it does not get larger. Seemed petty to return the set because of a 2-inch tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Council

customer_reviews.title: They roll nicely on all surfaces making them easy to maneuver through ...
customer_reviews.text: We used our luggage for the first time. Just returned from a cruise. The luggage survived 4 flights and the cruise! They roll nicely on all surfaces making them easy to maneuver through the airport! After watching the way they handle the luggage at the airport, I'm glad I didn't spend a fortune on our luggage. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Penny W.

customer_reviews.title: Several trips, no issues
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I spent quite a bit of time looking for luggage, as she travels a few months out of the year. American Tourister served me well when I traveled, thus we took a chance on this set and she has been very happy with it. It's survived three national trips over the past six months and will head to India and Spain next year. She loves the pockets, very well made wheels and the balance of the luggage when packed. No leaning or falling over. The frame is made well. You should be happy with this luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Shippy

customer_reviews.title: These suitcases have been great for all kinds of travel adventures
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases have been great for all kinds of travel adventures. Zippers are sturdy and wheels are well enforced. The various pockets on the suitcase make it convenient to quickly locate items. Straps on the inside are also well made to secure items together. Only thing I’d change is placing a strap on to to link together.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie_McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife tagged along on my 15 day 5 japanese city business trip. 4 flights, trains, buses, taxis, up/down subway stairs, dragging on sidewalks to hotels, overfilled with gifts, and bulging at the seams and zippers. We agreed if our luggage made it home entact it deserved 5 stars. I travel alot. I could have spent a lot more. Glad I didnt. Btw, the wheels held up great.
customer_reviews.author: rabidoutfitterdotcom

customer_reviews.title: An okay luggage set
customer_reviews.text: I like the suitcases as far as easy to roll and usability. However, the largest one is too big to take on an airplane and that was extremely disappointing. So I only use it to store old quilts in, and can only use the other 2 to travel. I would not order the set again for that reason. Otherwise, they've been good suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: S. DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Lightweight, roomy, sturdy without being completely inflexible, and the casters work perfectly. Only downside is that scuff marks *really* show, but that's my fault for choosing an unconventional color (burnt orange). Note: if you fully pack the largest suitcase, you *will* have an oversized/weight bag at check-in.
customer_reviews.author: It'sJenJenAgain

customer_reviews.title: Bagged it!
customer_reviews.text: I like how the its been halfway around the world and the wheels are still in good working conditions. We've used them to full capacity or to however much the luggage can hold. What I don't like is the bag tend to bulk forward on the front side when fully loaded. It could be from the product itself or the luggage people throwing it around so much at airports. Either way, its been a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Noriega

customer_reviews.title: ... these a couple of times now and am very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Have used these a couple of times now and am very happy with them. They seem to be very sturdy, which is likely my biggest concern in luggage. The largest suitcase is really big. I used it on a 2 week vacation, and although I tend to over pack, I had plenty of room in it. Very happy with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Dfoos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have only owned a small suitcase that I rarely used unless it was a long weekend trip. Otherwise, I always borrowed luggage from my parents. This time around, my parents were going on a vacation the same time I was so I figured it was time to purchase my own luggage. I love the 3 piece set and how they nest inside each other when not in use. They are all the perfect size depending on what I need to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: buy from warehouse for better deals
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 different sets for self and family. Great sizes for international travel and the spinner wheel helps a lot. Great buy, if you can score some of the warehouse deals. Paid generally less than 70 bucks for each set
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Cooler

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective combo of 3 pieces
customer_reviews.text: Cost effective combo of 3 pieces. Bags are just ok, not too cheap but not too sturdy either. 360 deg. wheels is a good addition. But again the quality could have been better. I have an older generation of these bags and they had a better liner - better quality and more organizing compartments, the exterior material also feels better than these new ones. But for the price, I guess no better options in the market.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed I bought it for my mom
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed I bought it for my mom , she went on vacation. The luggage is ripped on the side . I would never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broke after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality. Wheel broke on the 29" bag during first use and warranty repair is a major hassle to send back at my cost. the interior straps are all elastic so they do not cinch the clothes tight and contents were all over the place. No handle or grip on bottom to aide in lifting bag.
customer_reviews.author: JanB

customer_reviews.title: Good for road trips, not for flying.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on one trip and it has already ripped as the outer shell is too soft. It is definitely a low tier set for American Tourister, and it is perfect for driving trips. It will not stand up to baggage handlers at the airport though. For the price it is fair, but if you are a road warrior spend the extra money and buy a better set.
customer_reviews.author: William Buckley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good durablity so far.
customer_reviews.text: The wife took 6 flights -one of them international- with these suitcases, they seem to hold up very well but one of the zippers of the medium size suitcase broke in one of the flights and it makes me doubt about its long-term durability. Also, they are not the cuttest suitcases but they do have the best value/price relation I could find in a set of suitcases. It is a good buy and a good product overall. Will update if necessary. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kyril D'Ambrosi

customer_reviews.title: Cost was good, color was bright, three sizes for one price.
customer_reviews.text: See my headline! I'm happy so far and really love the bright color which is easy to locate at my destination. There was some problem in receiving the suitcases in the time that was noted, but a phone call found the problem and I received the suitcases at the original time noted.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Lund

customer_reviews.title: Travel in STYLE!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the set, in blue! It was great. Just got back from Belgium, France and the Netherlands and I had no rips, tears or problems with them. They roll great even on older city cobblestone streets. I would def. buy these again, in fact I may get the entire set for my husband for his travels.
customer_reviews.author: Isa Cooley

customer_reviews.title: These have turned out to be the perfect replacements. They are sturdy and well designed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Our older luggage had jut seen too many airports. These have turned out to be the perfect replacements. They are sturdy and well designed to meet the needs of the average traveler. I spent over 30 years traveling. I wish I had had these wheeled beauties back then.
customer_reviews.author: Hotrod57

customer_reviews.title: I love this set of luggage--color
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of luggage--color, size, style. HOWEVER, the handle to the smallest (carryon) was broken and I did not realize it until I was on the plane. It is frustrating to get something brand new and have it not work. I took the bag to the only authorized repair shop in Phoenix and am now waiting for the replacement part which is going to take about three weeks. Very disappointing. If they fix it I will be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Fromm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these. Shopped at several department stores and just couldn't find any reasonably priced luggage until we saw these. They are a good, medium quality bag especially for the price. We saved by getting them on Amazon. I also think the wheels on these have a better chance of surviving the airport baggage handlers than some other designs.
customer_reviews.author: D.S. - Lancaster PA

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful luggage set! Got it for a trip to South America and it sustained a lot of back and forth lugging around in the span of 3 weeks. The color is as shown, and the spinner wheels are a major plus- I don't know what I ever did without them. Very happy with my purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: 2-trip luggage
customer_reviews.text: This color.....I knew prior to purchasing.......gets dirty pretty easy.....i mean FAST!!.....just looking at it....POOF.....it gets darker. It is not as bright as depicted either.....a bit more dull in color than its portrayed blaze orange look. After only one oversees trip and the wheels drag a bit, they are not as solid as expected, The zippers appear to be holding up fine......as I thought these would be the first to go..... I believe these to be good for one.....possibly two more trips and we will be luggage shopping again. I would have rated them a (1); however, there was no mistaking these bags on the baggage claim carousel......Not may orange cases out there! That was a factor in our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Obe

customer_reviews.title: Duration: Only 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: I've just bought it, 5 days ago and used it for my first trip yesterday. Failed the test, it broke.. it appears that the material is not that tough. Although they have a very nice design, I am very disappointed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this particular series by American Tourister
customer_reviews.text: For those considering this soft sided luggage, take heed to all of the reviews regarding the zippers failing! My large 29" bag was used once and one of the double closure zippers failed on the front. Thankfully it stayed closed and my clothing was not spread across the luggage carousel. I have two sets, his and hers, and both have zipper failures so you will see two reviews from me. I would not recommend this particular series by American Tourister. Possibly a shadow of what the name used to mean.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, items were as discribed
customer_reviews.text: As described, the suitcases look good and seem of good quality. An excellent value for the price we paid. The colors are vibrant, the mechanical parts (wheels, zippers, etc) work. Time will tell if they are durable, but so far I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth and Jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: They hold a lot and roll raid over hard floors. I wish there was a bottom handle for lifting. They are not a fan of rugs however.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo 59

customer_reviews.title: Good Value don't expect Samsonite Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price you should NOT expect the bags to be on par with bags twice as much, but with that being said we've taken several trips both by air and car without issue. The retractable handles are a bit wobbly and the wheels can be a bit tough to keep going in a straight line, but again for the price/value you really can't get a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice luggage !
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a trip after using this luggage for the first time and was happy that it withstood the trip very well. The luggage was very easy to maneuver and it really holds a lot of items. I was extremely pleased with the price that I was able to purchase it especially for three pieces. It seems really durable but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Grammiegirl444

customer_reviews.title: Durable Enough for Occasional Travel
customer_reviews.text: So far, we've only taken them on one overseas trip, but they worked great. The bright blue color makes them quite easy to spot at baggage claim. (And when the airline lost them, they were easy to describe on the missing items sheet.) The multi-way spinners worked perfectly and made it very easy to roll these around. And they nested quite well, making for easy storage. They seem durable enough for occasional travel, which suits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Poppy

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this set. This set has flown with me on 4 different cross country flights, and I have used the smallest one for multiple road trips. They have held up to all of that and are ready for more. I couldn’t be happier with this luggage set.
customer_reviews.author: Stc124

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY LUGGAGE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY LUGGAGE. I travel frequently and my old luggage was pretty beat up. One store attempted to sell 1 bag at the same price that I got all 3 for. I purchased the blue set so that there was not a lot of confusion at the airport in baggage claim. It's a very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Cinny P

customer_reviews.title: Good quality perfect
customer_reviews.text: So I had bought the orange one from Jcpenny and I loved it and I needed more for traveling so I found this purple one. It said used or something so I was nervous that it’ll be horrible and stuff but my goodness it was still new and good and now I wish I had bought them here and saved some money.
customer_reviews.author: Hend

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to order American Tourister but have to say the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to order American Tourister but have to say the order arrived and they looked great, but the seems around the zipper of the largest bag were fraying and when the luggage is pushed it does not wheel straight as it should with the 4 wheels.....It's spacious and looks good but not sure it will last too long........I'm disappointed but needed luggage for my trip to Italy so it did serve it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: LUCIA CASTELLANO

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Moroccan Blue. So far, the luggage seems VERY durable and the largest one will hold a huge amount of items. The nesting feature is great for storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: BKG2016

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: this is well made and great price pack, because it came late , so i couldnt take it with me for my 1 month trip. :( but it's light weight when you international traveling , weights is crucial then i would recommend this. it may last a while , i will see
customer_reviews.author: chim cánh cut

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize this arrived broken on the handles and 2 of the wheels on the bag. I had to take this all the way to the motherland and ended up leavign them there for storage! I couldnt even bring it back to return. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ILOVEAMAZON123

customer_reviews.title: 18 months and 6 flights (including international) later and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: 18 months and 6 flights (including international) later and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: venuschild

customer_reviews.title: American Tourister luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice luggage! Fits so much stuff inside. Love the available extra inch after unzipping. Well worth the money. I got purple and the color is deep and rich. Can be cleaned with a damp sponge when needed.
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Really nice luggage for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice luggage for the price. I use the Medium one easy and the Wife the large one. The small is perfect for most overhead bins. Spin wheels are now a must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra large suit case in this set. I tend to over pack so I am now able to take everything in 1 bag. Love the color. It's easy to find my set.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne graham

customer_reviews.title: Great Color
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m giving this three stars is that it came in slightly crushed. This was way too heavy for the mail carrier. Other than that these worked great for our honeymoon. Plenty of room. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: lbell

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I used these only once and they couldn't stand up to the airline abuse. Had to purchase a new one just to get home.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Decent Set of Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied with my purchase. They arent top quality but I an sure I will get my moneys worth out of them. We just used them for vacation and they held up nice. We did not fly anywhere so the bags did not endure that abuse. The wheels are nice and roll easily.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Broken on first trip
customer_reviews.text: These bags did not even survive one flight. During my first flight when them the bars for the handles were bent and they no longer go up. The airline mentioned this happens often with these bags because the metal bars are not very strong and they bend when other bags are stacked on top during the baggage loading and unloading at the airport. I will try to get new through the warranty but would advise anyone thinking about purchasing them not to if you plan on using them for trips requiring flying.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set (orange) far exceeded my expectations. Stylish, roomy, and completely functional with useful pockets. I travel a lot and these will be my new 'go to' bags.
customer_reviews.author: BrianV

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and wheels glide so well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip. Inexpensive and worth the buy. We had a set but I wanted a new set with 4 wheels. This worked so well going from the car to hotel room. Nice sizes and quality
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: cute, fun orange color, but thin and gets dirty fast!
customer_reviews.text: Cute fun color, but suitcase is awfully thin, don't think it will last too long. After the first flight the orange color was badly marked up by black grease... ugh. I'd recommend sticking with darker colors if flying.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSnd

customer_reviews.title: Poorest quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present and the handle broke on first trip. Very cheaply made and not worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until you actually use it...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great, and then you get home from ONE trip with the luggage. One zipper is broken, and the stitching on another one is falling out. NOT worth the price, especially now that I can't return it to Amazon since I ordered it far in advance of our trip. Waste of over $100.
customer_reviews.author: legendmac

customer_reviews.title: Returned. One had a defective handle.
customer_reviews.text: One of the cases had a defective handle. It kept getting stuck. It didn't won't to go down once you got it up.
customer_reviews.author: deedoor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find at Baggage Claim
customer_reviews.text: Great price for perfectly sized luggage. It was very easy to spot on the baggage carousel among all the black bags. The smallest bag fits in the overhead nicely. It's durable and lightweight. The 4 spinner wheels makes getting through the airport a breeze. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TCarollo

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet but seem to be well made. Roll real easy.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Blunk

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a great value for a 3 piece set from AT. We recently used the large piece for a 2 week vacation, including 2 flights and multiple moves in/out of our van and hotel rooms. We did notice one of the front pocket zipper pulls was broken off at some point and there is a slight puncture on the bottom, which we're guessing was from airport handling. Overall, happy with the product for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G.

customer_reviews.title: Zippers broke on first trip
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this luggage set. The wheels rolled easily and they seemed sturdy. But on my flight home of my first trip using it, both zippers on the main opening to the largest suitcase broke off. I was very lucky it stayed zipped together until I got home and all of my things didn't fall all over. I'm currently trying to find an email address to contact the company about a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Broke after third use.  Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.text: After just the third time using this luggage, the zipper on the midsized bag broke rending the bag useless. Also after the third use, the handle on the carry-on bag now sticks and doesn't always work. I have been unable to find anyone at Amazon to help me with this. I wasted my money and now need to go buy a whole new set. I just wish anyone that sold it to me cared...
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the One Size (cheaper) and received the 3 nested, which is what I wanted. Not sure what I would have gotten if I had chosen the other selection. Anyway, good quality, and typical speedy Amazon delivery and service. I ended up returning it because it was not what my wife wanted, but I was happy with the purchase, and thought it was good value.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stephen Vail

customer_reviews.title: Good price for one/2 time use
customer_reviews.text: Maybe for 1/2 use depending on how many times luggage chains they go through
customer_reviews.author: Tania H

customer_reviews.title: Damaged after first use
customer_reviews.text: Already damaged after first use. The zipper is busted and the logo is already ripping off. After it’s second use the inside started to fray really bad. In order to get the zipper fixed I have to pay to get it shipped to American Tourister....ridiculous. DO NOT PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah M. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time - it was as described in the product review. It has since made international trips and is holding on strong.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Hoshi

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed from American Tourister
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. This past week was his first opportunity to use this set. First time out and pull handle and zipper broke on medium size suitcase. Very disappointed from American Tourister. Tried to contact their website and it is conveniently down.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Kiedinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. We will be traveling with these in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. We will be traveling with these in March. We will find out how well they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Lugage set
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for living and I was looking for a good set of good quality and sturdy luggage with spiner wheels. Coz if your luggage doesn't have spiner wheels it's not worth of buying. So far I have used them in 2 long trips. No scratches and not any damages from long distance flying. Very smart buy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage
customer_reviews.text: Just received them but they look great. The navy blue looks purple but it didn’t matter to me. If I truly wanted blue, it wouldn’t have worked.
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: 3-piece luggage set in purple.... worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Came very very quickly! Also came in good condition. I’m pleased with the color, how smooth the zippers are, and how well the wheels roll. I am very happy with the quality for the price for a 3-piece luggage set.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: These are not the suitcases you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Zipper broken on two suitcases on our first trip and none of the suitcases were full. Made of thin cheap material. Clothes don't stay; they fall low when you lift the suitcase. Strap to hold them in place - too short. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: David Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger then I had thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Used them for our trip and they were very easy to push. Held allot of kids clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Scrappy

customer_reviews.title: Very good suitcases, price was pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Very good suitcases, price was pretty good. Suspect if you wait you can find a better deal, but we needed in a hurry. Good price, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice color blue for a change and variety of sizes. Easy to maneuver. Was a bit disappointed that the 25" suitcase was slightly damaged with scratches and scuff marks but too much of a hassle to return and after a trip or two it will probably be scratched even more. That will likely be the one I use most. The largest will be good for an extended road trip and the small one will work for overnights. I ordered it on Sunday afternoon and had it by Tuesday! Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nozygirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My children loved it!! Couldn’t believe how much the suitcases held!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but a little cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in great condition. First trip the medium-sized case main zipper came apart at hotel. Had to work slide back on and squeeze together for trip home. Put extra strap on it for security. Not sure zipper will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Retired and Lovin' Life

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Heavy
customer_reviews.text: These aren't as bright as the picture(thank God). But the suit cases are extremely heavy, empty (cannot imagine the over weight charges at the airport).
customer_reviews.author: sharktail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality luggage. The largest one is really big for a big family. Medium size is just right. All have nice pockets inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Magic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good usable luggage. No problem dragging them, the rollers are superb!
customer_reviews.author: cjones

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized and fast delivery. Carry on is larger than my other one but will see if it fits in the overhead bin when I use it in a few months. I would have given a 5 star, as I wished they would have put a handle on the bottom instead of the side for lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to the quality I expected from American Tourister. Considering donating them and purchasing Samsonite for quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good size and functional
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. The big one especially has a good form factor. The shape is not bulgy which makes them easy to fit in spaces. Easy to roll. The quality looks great but I would have to hold the final verdict until I put them through another 2 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Shireen kaur

customer_reviews.title: Seems good but two wheels are sheared off
customer_reviews.text: It seems nice but two of the wheels are sheared as if someone had dragged the luggage horribly while wheels were still in fixed mode. But they work.
customer_reviews.author: Syeda Anum

customer_reviews.title: Love them easy to find in the baggage terminal!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect suitcases! Go with darker colors. One flight the speed every bit of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: diggitydog

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to travel brand. Used it a couple days ago. Survived the flight and still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suitcase.
customer_reviews.text: Used for years without any problems. The wheels are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Cgitt

customer_reviews.title: ... more I buy this brand and I am SOOOOOOOO happy and I adore with this BRAND
customer_reviews.text: This is I think ten times or more I buy this brand and I am SOOOOOOOO happy and I adore with this BRAND
customer_reviews.author: kawther

product_meta.title: American Tourister AT Pops Plus Softside 3-Piece Spinner Wheel Luggage Set, Moroccan Blue, (21/25/29)
product_meta.description: Size:One Size| Color:Moroccan BluePops plus is a 3-piece spinner set made from durable polyester that is perfect for the leisure traveler who wants to make a bold statement on the go
feature_bullets: Four multi-directional spinner wheels for easy mobility. Rolls upright so there's no weight on your arm
Padded top and side carry handles provide comfort when lifting a fully packed case. Feature retractable handle
Expandable - Fabric folded within a zipper compartment opens with a zip to add 2" or more carrying space to the interior of your suitcase
Interiors feature multiple pockets for organization,Cases expand for added packing capacity

Case Dimensions - 21" x 14" x 8". Overall Dimensions - 24" x 14" x 8"Weight: 8.6 lbs Case Dimensions - 25" x 18" x 8.5". Overall Dimensions - 28" x 18" x 8.5"Weight: 10.5 lbs Case Dimensions - 29" x 20" x 9.5". Overall Dimensions - 32" x 20" x 9.5" Weight: 12.10 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars845 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
